sentences.en: He must be wondering why everyone is being so beastly to him.
sentences.cn: 他一定正在纳闷为什么大家都对他如此刻薄。

sentences.en: He was so beastly, you've no idea.
I can never find those beastly little blue packets.
sentences.cn: 那些肮脏的蓝色小盒我无法找到.

sentences.en: I love you for understanding. I'm just - I'm beastly over - sensitive.
sentences.cn: 我爱你,因为你对我是那么体贴入微, 刚才我只还是 —— 过于神经过敏了.

sentences.en: I saw him stick his beastly nose out of the wainscoting.
sentences.cn: 它把鼻子从墙板那边伸出来啦.

sentences.en: I won't put myself in such a beastly false position.
sentences.cn: 我不能使自己处于这样引起旁人误解的恶劣地位.

sentences.en: I've got some of the beastly staff on my coat sleeve.
sentences.cn: 我的大衣袖子沾上这倒霉的油漆了.

sentences.en: She behaved beastly toward her mother - in - law .
sentences.cn: 她对她 婆婆 很粗暴.

sentences.en: Sir , that Breathitt House , in Atlanta, is a beastly place!
sentences.cn: 先生, 亚特兰大的布莱斯特旅馆是个糟糕透顶的地方!

sentences.en: There's such a lot of beastly competition about.
They pretend to be guarding the public's morals, and they corrupt them with their beastly reports.
sentences.cn: 他们装作保卫公众道德, 但是他们的下流报道只能使公众道德堕落.

words.tran_cn: 野兽；畜生，人面兽心的人

trans.tran_cn: 野兽般的，凶残的，<口>使人不愉快的，恶劣的
